first_para: Stephen Anthony Christopher Lloyd (born 15 June 1957) is a British Liberal Democrat politician and business development consultant. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Eastbourne and the Liberal Democrats' spokesperson for Northern Ireland in the House of Commons.

full.extract: Stephen Anthony Christopher Lloyd (born 15 June 1957) is a British Liberal Democrat politician and business development consultant. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Eastbourne and the Liberal Democrats' spokesperson for Northern Ireland in the House of Commons.
full.title: Stephen Lloyd
